name: techgrandpa
0:
”Alexa, Ask Tech Grandpa for a fact”
”Alexa, Ask Tech Grandpa something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech grandpa
des: Tech Grandpa describes today's technology in simple octogenarian terminology. If you want to know something about how Grandpa thinks about technology, just ask. He will give it to you in non-tech talk.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
